memory.title: In-Memory store
memory.description: A non-persistent RDF store which is kept in the RAM until reboot.

tdb.title: Jena TDB
tdb.description: A persistence library for Jena that uses the filesystem to store triples.

sdb.title: Jena SDB PostgreSQL
sdb.description: A persistence library for Jena backed by the PostgreSQL RDBMS.

d2rq.title: D2RQ PostgreSQL
d2rq.description: A mapping engine to access relational data with SPARQL.

neo4j.title: Sail Neo4J
neo4j.description: A NoSQL graph database which stores RDF triples.

hbase.title: HBase RDF
hbase.description: A NoSQL column database wich stores RDF triples.

sesame.title: OpenRDF Sesame
sesame.description: A triple store accessed via its SPARQL Endpoint.

geoinsee.title: COG INSEE
geoinsee.description: French official geographical code, contains administrative geographical entities in France.

demoinsee.title: POP INSEE
demoinsee.description: French offical census data of 2010, divided by town.

geonames.title: GeoNames FR
geonames.description: The GeoNames geographical features database, restrained to France.

isf.title: ISF
isf.description: Tax data about the french tax on wealth.

taweb.title: TAWeb
taweb.description: Data provided by other M2 projects.
